mainText:
I grew up with Apple. My dad had a Macintosh color classic that he liked 
to take a part and put back together. When we got our first iMac, my 
brother and I used to giggle when we wrote ridiculous passages and 
played them back in SimpleText. I wrote all my papers in ClarisWorks.

My parents bought me an iPod when I got into college, and my dad sent 
Steve an e-mail about adding video to the iPod before the launch of the 
video enabled iPod.

Apple and Steve had a huge impact on my life and my memories. Steve will 
be missed.
author: Jake
